mapper.select: SELECT thread.tid, thread.tname, thread.tcont, thread.ttime, thread.ttop, thread.tdel, thread.fid, thread.uid, users.uname, users.udesc FROM thread, users WHERE tdel = 0 AND thread.uid = users.uid ORDER BY tid DESC

SELECT thread.tid, thread.tname, thread.tcont, thread.ttime, thread.ttop, thread.tdel, thread.fid, thread.uid, users.uname, users.udesc FROM thread, users WHERE fid = #{fid} AND tdel = 0 AND thread.uid = users.uid ORDER BY tid DESC

SELECT thread.tid, thread.tname, thread.tcont, thread.ttime, thread.ttop, thread.tdel, thread.fid, thread.uid, users.uname, users.udesc FROM thread, users WHERE ttop = 1 AND tdel = 0 AND thread.uid = users.uid

SELECT thread.tid, thread.tname, thread.tcont, thread.ttime, thread.ttop, thread.tdel, thread.fid, thread.uid, users.uname, users.udesc FROM thread, users WHERE tid = #{tid} AND tdel = 0 AND thread.uid = users.uid
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO thread (tname, tcont, fid, uid) VALUES (#{tname}, #{tcont}, #{fid}, #{uid})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: UPDATE thread SET tdel = 1 WHERE tid = #{tid}
UPDATE thread SET tname = #{tname}, tcont = #{tcont} WHERE tid = #{tid}
UPDATE thread SET ttop = 1 WHERE tid = #{tid}
UPDATE thread SET ttop = 0 WHERE tid = #{tid}
